General.Name: Nantong Haixing Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Nantong Haixing Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electrode foils for aluminum electrolytic capacitors in the People's Republic of China. Its products include medium and high voltage etched and formed foils; and low voltage etched and formed foils. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Nantong, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 519, Tongyang South Road, Nantong, China
